verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* put \w my|strong="H3068"\w* faith \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*; take \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* hands \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* cruel \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* make \w me|strong="H5921"\w* free;

So \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H3467"\w* come rushing \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* soul \w like|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion, wounding \w it|strong="H3068"\w*, while \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* saviour.

\w O|strong="H5315"\w* Lord \w my|strong="H5337"\w* \w God|strong="H0369"\w*, \w if|strong="H6435"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* done this; \w if|strong="H6435"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* hands \w have|strong="H0369"\w* done \w any|strong="H0369"\w* wrong;

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* given back \w evil|strong="H5766"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H0430"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H5766"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* me, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* taken anything \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H0430"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* against me without cause;

Let \w my|strong="H0518"\w* hater go after \w my|strong="H0518"\w* soul and take \w it|strong="H0518"\w*; let \w my|strong="H0518"\w* life be crushed \w to|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* earth, and \w my|strong="H0518"\w* honour into \w the|strong="H0518"\w* dust. (Selah.)

Come up, Lord, \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w your|strong="H7291"\w* wrath; \w be|strong="H0776"\w* lifted up against \w my|strong="H7291"\w* haters; \w be|strong="H0776"\w* awake, \w my|strong="H7291"\w* God, \w give|strong="H2416"\w* orders \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* judging.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* meeting \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* nations \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* round \w you|strong="H6680"\w*; \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* seat, \w then|strong="H6965"\w*, \w over|strong="H6965"\w* \w them|strong="H6680"\w*, \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w high|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H3816"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* judge \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w peoples|strong="H3816"\w*; \w give|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* decision \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, O Lord, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* righteousness, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* let \w my|strong="H5921"\w* virtue \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* reward.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* let \w the|strong="H5921"\w* evil \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* evil-doer come \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* end, \w but|strong="H5921"\w* give strength \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w upright|strong="H8537"\w*: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* men's minds \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hearts \w are|strong="H3068"\w* tested \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*.

\w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* saviour \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* upright \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w heart|strong="H3826"\w*, \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3559"\w* breastplate.

\w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* judge \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* angry \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* evil-doers every day.

If \w a|strong="H3117"\w* \w man|strong="H6662"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* not turned \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* evil, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* make \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sword sharp; \w his|strong="H3605"\w* bow \w is|strong="H0430"\w* bent \w and|strong="H0430"\w* ready.

\w He|strong="H0518"\w* \w has|strong="H2719"\w* \w made|strong="H3559"\w* \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* instruments \w of|strong="H2719"\w* death; \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w makes|strong="H3559"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w arrows|strong="H7198"\w* flames \w of|strong="H2719"\w* fire.

\w That|strong="H3559"\w* man \w is|strong="H4194"\w* \w a|strong="H3559"\w* worker \w of|strong="H3627"\w* evil; \w the|strong="H3559"\w* seed \w of|strong="H3627"\w* wrongdoing \w has|strong="H4194"\w* given birth \w to|strong="H3559"\w* deceit.

\w He|strong="H2009"\w* \w has|strong="H2009"\w* made \w a|strong="H3205"\w* hole deep \w in|strong="H5999"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H2029"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* falling into \w the|strong="H3205"\w* hole which \w he|strong="H2009"\w* \w has|strong="H2009"\w* made

\w His|strong="H6466"\w* wrongdoing \w will|strong="H5307"\w* \w come|strong="H5307"\w* back \w to|strong="H5307"\w* \w him|strong="H5307"\w*, \w and|strong="H5307"\w* \w his|strong="H6466"\w* violent behaviour \w will|strong="H5307"\w* \w come|strong="H5307"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w his|strong="H6466"\w* \w head|strong="H5307"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* praise \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* righteousness; \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w make|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* song \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord Most High.
